data.BEST PRACTICES:: Establish and regularly review a Packaging process to package assets in accordance with local laws, regulations, and agreements.
data.ADDITIONAL RECOMMENDATIONS::
• Monitor the on-site packaging and loading of content
• Secure containers depending on asset value (e.g., case with a combination lock)
• Utilize tamper-evident tape, packaging, and/or seals
• Labels only include address, barcode, aliases (i.e., non-descript)
